titleStmt.title: The power of the civil magistrate in matters of religion vindicated the extent of his power determined in a sermon preached before the first Parliament on a monthly fast day / by ... Mr. Stephen Marshall ... / published by G. Firmin ... with notes upon the sermon.
titleStmt.author: Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655.
Firmin, Giles, 1614-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nathaniel Webb and William Grantham ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The civil magistrates power in matters of religion, vindicated.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Serminary Library, New York.
